about_the_game:
Just in time for the 11th season, Elton, Bernhard Hoëcker and Kai Pflaume are back on the PC with a brand new edition of WER WEISS DENN SOWAS? In the 3rd game, the three once again take on their roles as team captains and presenters. Play together with Elton or compete together with Bernhard Hoëcker. Whether alone, in pairs or with the whole family - WER WEISS DENN SOWAS? - The 3rd game demands everything from you. Prove how good your knowledge really is in 30 new shows with exciting questions and the original answer videos. Of course, Kai Pflaume will once again charmingly guide you through the shows. Knowledge, fun and lots of entertainment are just a push of a button away. So what are you waiting for? Do you know what you can do with a plastic bottle, a compressor, a blow-out gun, a drill and a metal milling machine? No? WHO KNOWS THAT?

Did you know that the highest prize money ever won by viewers was 208.29 euros per head?

Key features:
  • Perfect realisation of the TV show with the characters and original voices of Kai Pflaume, Elton and Bernhard Hoëcker.
  • 30 complete shows with more than 390 questions from over 100 categories and the original answer videos.
  • One-, two-, three- or four-player mode: Choose who you want to play alongside - Bernhard Hoëcker, in a team with Elton or with your friends?
  • Create your own character from a variety of different options
.

In the 3rd game, the three once again take on their roles as team captains and presenters. Play together with Elton or compete together with Bernhard Hoëcker. Whether alone, in pairs or with the whole family - WER WEISS DENN SOWAS? - The 3rd game demands everything from you. Knowledge, fun and lots of entertainment are just a push of a button away. So what are you waiting for? Do you know what you can do with a plastic bottle, a compressor, a blow-out gun, a drill and a metal milling machine? No? WHO KNOWS THAT?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz x86 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and Shader 5.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
